Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3162 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-3162 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-21. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kube-vip-cloud-provider is earlier than 0.0.2-21, affected by CVE-2022-3162
